name: Made In M.U.G.E.N
description:
Made in M.U.G.E.N is a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure fighting game inspired by Heritage For The Future, All Star Battle and JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Requiem It is worked on by @✝ᴇɴʀɪᴄᴏ·ᴘᴜᴄᴄɪ✝ and @🔅𝑫𝒐𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒊𝒄𝒐 𝑷𝒖𝒄𝒄𝒊🌧.

The game features a big roster of JJBA characters, stages and bosses. Some of the game's assets are open source assets made by other Mugen developers, but most of the assets are made by us.

The game will have regular updates with new characters, stages, bosses and other mechanics coming out regularly. On release, version 0.1.1 will feature a big roster of JJBA Part 1-7 characters.

I hope you enjoy!

https://gamejolt.com/games/MadeInMugen/613499
